example.code: Remove-APSResourceTag -ResourceArn arn:aws:appstream:us-east-1:123456789012:stack/SessionScriptTest -TagKey StackState Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action? Performing the operation "Remove-APSResourceTag (UntagResource)" on target "arn:aws:appstream:us-east-1:123456789012:stack/SessionScriptTest". [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"): A
example.description: This sample removes a resource tag from AppStream resource
